## WorkerDecoderProtocol.ConfigurationMessage interface

Interface for a ConfigurationMessage that is sent from the datasource to the decoder. The message used to configure the \[\[ITileDecoder\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface ConfigurationMessage extends DecoderMessage 
```
